meta.title: María-Fernanda Villalobos | Frontend Developer
meta.description: Portfolio of María-Fernanda Villalobos, a Frontend Developer recognized as #3 in React in Chile. Specialist in creating inclusive, accessible, and high-performance web experiences.
meta.og_description: Specialist in creating inclusive, accessible, and high-performance web experiences.

hero.name: María-Fernanda Villalobos
hero.headline: Frontend Developer | #3 React.js Developer in Chile (GitHunter)
hero.mission: Passionate about Inclusive Design and crafting accessible web experiences. I transform complex problems into fluid, efficient, and intuitive software solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.image_alt: Hologram of María-Fernanda projected from a mobile phone.
about.paragraph_1: My journey started in health sciences, decoding human needs. Today, I decode the digital world, building technology that feels intuitive and human. This unique fusion of empathy and code led to my recognition as the #3 React Developer in Chile by GitHunter.
about.paragraph_2: My development philosophy is built on precision and inclusion. I craft pixel-perfect interfaces and optimize for speed because I believe every millisecond matters. But my true passion is building a more accessible web, ensuring the digital future we're coding today is open to everyone.
about.ideal_team_paragraph: I thrive in collaborative teams that value creative problem-solving and are passionate about building products that make a real difference.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.demo_link_aria_label: View the live demo for {projectName} (opens in a new tab)
projects.code_link_aria_label: View the source code for {projectName} (opens in a new tab)

project_1.name: PyDay Chile Conference Website
project_1.challenge: To develop the Python Chile community's first SPA under a tight deadline, requiring seamless integration with a pre-existing and highly restrictive brand identity.
project_1.contribution: I architected and developed the front-end using Next.js, establishing an intuitive navigation structure. I also introduced a formal documentation process to align stakeholders and efficiently manage team dynamics.
project_1.result: The application was successfully delivered on schedule, serving as the central information hub for attendees and setting a new quality standard for the community's future web projects.

project_2.name: Client Project: Valeria del Real
project_2.challenge: To lead a non-technical client through her first digitalization process by creating her first professional website, with the key technical constraint of optimizing low-resolution source images.
project_2.contribution: I led the full project lifecycle from concept to deployment. My focus was on optimizing and processing the visual assets to ensure a professional aesthetic without compromising site performance or design integrity.
project_2.result: A fully functional and deployed website that successfully translated the client's vision into a digital platform, showcasing my ability to manage client relationships and guide them through technical processes.

project_3.name: Hites - Mobile E-commerce Challenge
project_3.challenge: To replicate a desktop product page into a fully responsive, mobile-first version in a 24-hour, high-pressure technical challenge, using only a single screenshot as a reference.
project_3.contribution: I developed the interface from scratch using React and a mobile-first layout. My resourcefulness in extracting and optimizing production visual assets was a key differentiator noted by the hiring team.
project_3.result: Delivered a functional and high-fidelity landing page, demonstrating exceptional performance under extreme time constraints. This solution positioned me as one of the top two finalists for the role.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
contact.invitation: I am available for new challenges. If you have a project in mind or an opportunity that aligns with my profile, feel free to reach out.
